Broker

I read that a group of German scientists analyzed the faces of "Saddam." We know he uses doubles all the time. This group of scientists say that Saddam has not been seen in public in seven years. 
 
 Could Saddam be dead and his sons or someone else using the doubles to continue inspiring fear in the Iraqis to lead Iraq? 
 
 It's a great arrangment...keep the people scared, countries worried over someone who no longer exists.
 
 It's a leap...what do you think?
Debater
no he talked on tv recently
Broker
Or did he? You think you see him all the time, but it isn't him.
Stormin Norman

He could be dead. However, it is the spirit of Saddam, which still exists in that country that must be defeated. That means taking out the command and control, and the terrorists that are using his image to commit atrocities.

he's not dead. it's like saying bin Laden is dead. they are just in some other country, hiding, waiting, living their miserable lives, and slowly rotting. they deserve it. for what they have done. once we have a running democracy in iraq he'll pull another 9/11 on us and we'll declare war again and again on iraq. and then everyone will turn on each other and destroy the world. no one in the world is happy unless there is war going on.

no one in the world is happy unless there is war going on.
 Wow, a that's a tad pessimistic. I don't think it really matters if Saddam is living anymore or not. If he doesn't have the power of Iraq behind him, he couldn't do much damage before someone caught him. We need to make the Iraqi's be stable, and form a reliable sort of government so that they can learn how to become independent of a dictator. However, this may not be a possibility because they are so used to being told what to do....but this is a different debate. What do you think?
